hidden_orders: SELECT order_id FROM ridehistory.hidden_orders WHERE phone_id IN (SELECT UNNEST($1))
orders: SELECT order_created_at, order_id FROM ridehistory.user_index WHERE ((NOT is_hidden) AND (phone_id IN (SELECT UNNEST($1)) AND order_created_at > $2 AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')) AND ($8 IS NULL OR order_created_at > $8 AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')
